thread.title: The rise, fall and search for redemption of Cleveland mayoral candidate and City Councilman Jeff Johnson
thread.title_full: The rise, fall and search for redemption of Cleveland mayoral candidate and City Councilman Jeff Johnson

author: Leila Atassi, cleveland.com
title: The rise, fall and search for redemption of Cleveland mayoral candidate and City Councilman Jeff Johnson
text: For nearly the past two decades, Cleveland City Councilman Jeffrey Johnson has sought the public's forgiveness for a 1998 conviction on extortion charges. He hopes to make his political comeback complete by becoming the city's next mayor.
